articles.title: COVID-19: Singapore tightens border measures for travellers from Australia's Victoria state - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Singapore will tighten border control measures for those with a travel history to Australia's Victoria state, after a spike in COVID-19 cases there, said the Ministry of Health (MOH) on Thursday (May 27).
